text: Titia janwar ke dhori loise, aru tai logote kiman misa bhabobadi khan kun tai usorte chihna khan dikhai thakise, juntu pora tai janwar laga chihna thaka bisi jonke thogai dise aru kun tai laga murti ke puja korise. Duijon ke jui juli thaka te jinda pora phelai dise kun to kitia bhi khotom nohoi.
